description: Defines constants for various states a bot user can be in, especially during multi-step processes like selling items. Centralizing these states improves code readability, maintainability, and reduces errors.

constants.name: IDLE
constants.description: The default state when a user is not engaged in any specific process.

constants.name: CANCELLED
constants.description: Indicates a process has been explicitly cancelled by the user.

constants.name: SELLING_BATCHING_ITEMS
constants.description: User is currently in the process of batching items for sale using the /jual command.

constants.name: SELLING_AWAITING_PRICE
constants.description: User has batched items and the bot is awaiting price input.

constants.name: SELLING_AWAITING_CONFIRMATION
constants.description: User has provided a price and the bot is awaiting confirmation to finalize the sale.

constants.name: SELLING_FINALIZED
constants.description: The selling process has been successfully finalized.
